kv23.1:5.3: Ekādhippāyena assamaṇena hotabbaṃ, abhikkhunā hotabbaṃ, chinnamūlena hotabbaṃ pārājikena hotabbanti?
kv23.1:5.8: Ekādhippāyena pāṇo hantabbo, adinnaṃ ādiyitabbaṃ, musā bhaṇitabbā, pisuṇaṃ bhaṇitabbaṃ, pharusaṃ bhaṇitabbaṃ, samphaṃ palapitabbaṃ, sandhi cheditabbo, nillopaṃ hātabbaṃ, ekāgārikaṃ kātabbaṃ, paripanthe ṭhātabbaṃ, paradāro gantabbo, gāmaghātako kātabbo, nigamaghātako kātabboti?
